author: Simon Difford
description: Bone dry, light and delicate. The sweetness and colour contributed by the maraschino cherry garnish are essential to this drink's success.
name: El Presidente (sans grenadine)
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
